CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: In order to corroborate the effect of the heteroatom substitution on charge transporting properties of the polymers , top - contact organic field - effect transistors ( OFETs ) were fabricated using solution processed PCDTBT and PCDSeBT , respectively , as the semiconducting layer on the octadecyltrichlorosilane ( OTS ) self - assembled monolayer (SAM)-modified Si / SiO 2 substrates ( see the detailed devices fabrication in the Experimental Section ).

Let's think step by step.

1. PCDTBT - This is a type of polymer and can be considered a material.
2. PCDSeBT - This is also a type of polymer and can be considered a material.
3. Octadecyltrichlorosilane (OTS) - This is a chemical compound and can be considered a material.
4. SAM - This stands for self-assembled monolayer, which is a type of material.
5. Si / SiO2 substrates - This refers to silicon and silicon dioxide substrates, which are materials.

Therefore, the "Material Name" entities in the paragraph are: PCDTBT, PCDSeBT, octadecyltrichlorosilane (OTS), self-assembled monolayer (SAM), Si, and SiO2.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Name.

1. PCDTBT
2. PCDSeBT
3. Octadecyltrichlorosilane (OTS)
4. Si / SiO2 substrates

These are the entities that clearly refer to Material Names in the paragraph.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| PCDTBT |
| PCDSeBT |
| Octadecyltrichlorosilane (OTS) |
| Si / SiO2 substrates |

PV.content:
Please identify the "Property Value" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: In order to corroborate the effect of the heteroatom substitution on charge transporting properties of the polymers , top - contact organic field - effect transistors ( OFETs ) were fabricated using solution processed PCDTBT and PCDSeBT , respectively , as the semiconducting layer on the octadecyltrichlorosilane ( OTS ) self - assembled monolayer (SAM)-modified Si / SiO 2 substrates ( see the detailed devices fabrication in the Experimental Section ).

Let's think step by step.

1. "the effect of the heteroatom substitution on charge transporting properties of the polymers" - This sentence suggests that the charge transporting properties of the polymers are being evaluated, so "charge transporting properties" could be considered a "Property Value" entity.
2. "top-contact organic field-effect transistors (OFETs)" - While this is a device and not a property, it is being used to measure the properties of the polymers, so it is relevant to the discussion of property values.
3. "solution processed PCDTBT and PCDSeBT" - These are specific types of polymers being used in the experiment, and their properties are being evaluated, so "PCDTBT" and "PCDSeBT" could be considered "Property Value" entities.
4. "octadecyltrichlorosilane (OTS) self-assembled monolayer (SAM)-modified Si / SiO2 substrates" - This is a description of the substrate material on which the polymers are being deposited. While not a property value itself, it is relevant to the discussion of property values because the properties of the substrate can affect the properties of the polymers.

Therefore, the "Property Value" entities in the paragraph are:

* Charge transporting properties
* PCDTBT
* PCDSeBT
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Value of Material Property.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.
